meanings.definition: A company that conducts its business primarily through the internet.
meanings.sent1: The dotcom hired many employees to work on their online projects.
meanings.sent2: I visit a dotcom to buy books online.
meanings.sent3: The dotcom's CEO joked that their office is just a bunch of computers in a room.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, a successful dotcom is like a bustling virtual marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The dotcom's growth was so rapid, it became a household name in no time.

meanings.sent1: To access the website, type the dotcom correctly in the browser.
meanings.sent2: I always remember the dotcom of my favorite online store.
meanings.sent3: The dotcom for the new restaurant was so long, it took forever to type.
meanings.sent4: The dotcom is like the front door to the online world.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to include the dotcom when sharing the website link.
